     post on craigslist under 'missed connections'

12.26.17  11:26 pm   what can be defined as 'the source code that shapes reality'

     this may surprise you, but it's actually made of goo

12.26.17  10:34 pm   how much do you like answering all these questions?

     i'd say about a 6.4

12.26.17  9:28 pm   any tv show recommendations?

     reasonable shirts

12.26.17  9:26 pm   did you go to college/university and if so, where?

     school of hard knox

12.26.17  8:54 pm   is it legal to E X I S T?

     it is a legal grey area

12.26.17  8:02 pm   Hey bill I just wanted to show you something that I think is pretty cool - the way that good writing can make you slow down. Here's a fun example:
"Somewhere, an actual balloon floats into the horizon of a midwestern town"
That one word - actual - makes it much harder to just skim through the sentence,, makes you think. Do you agree? Have any input?

     oh hell yeah. i agree, there are many many ways to play with writing so that it is exactly how you want it, and i am very aware of this. you may not believe it, but even on this questions page i frequently take great care in that regard, even though i sometimes may appear to be using the grammar of a teenager from a low income family, it is almost always carefully crafted to have the exact results i am looking for

12.26.17  7:35 pm   In the song do you have a lyric similar to "I got things I want to say"?

     i don't have enough time to say the

12.26.17  7:20 pm   Are you a toddler?

     almost

12.26.17  7:01 pm   If you didn't go to berklee why did you write music with berklee notation paper?

     someone gave me 2 stacks many years ago, and it's really good stuff. then when it ran out i went back to buying it on 48th st like a normal person

12.26.17  6:32 pm   what's your favorite pun?

     but, fuckin

12.26.17  6:30 pm   12.26.17  4:05 am   do you actually do this

     absolutely not

12.26.17  5:52 pm   what's the best thing that happened to you this year?

     everything is good and bad in so many ways, it's hard to decide which is which and it is even harder to pick one thing which nothing is better than

12.26.17  5:34 pm   i deleted christmas this year. whatever you think happened yesterday was a dream from when you and everyone else were in somnostasis for an infinitesimal fraction of a second when we skipped over december the 25th

     did you know you can skip christmas without skipping december 25

12.26.17  5:10 pm   Is it pronounced gif or gif?

     it is usually not pronounced

12.26.17  5:03 pm   Thanks for the Instagram images! It seems like you are beginning to integrate live action into your post-hotewig video world. Super-exciting! Is that part of the time consuming challenge when compared to "outside"?

     yes. although outside took much longer than i wanted it to also

12.26.17  3:52 pm   Why are potatoes a sore subject for you? Does it have to do with the current political climate of the Tater Farms?

     why would you continue to bring up a subject after someone has told you it is a sore subject? why do you have that strategy. what is this guantanamo bay or something

12.26.17  3:49 pm   Why do you like music?

      6.20.17  8:51 am

12.26.17  3:49 pm   How much wet is water

     i'd say about a 6.4

12.26.17  3:48 pm   Do doctors have a degree in doctology?

     no, only doctologists

12.26.17  3:43 pm   12.26.17  2:02 am But I like live action music videos even more than the "history of..." videos! Do you ever feel like you're going crazy trying to make your fans happy?

     i never tried to make them happy, in the long term they have always been the happiest when i have done something which i originally thought was right. the fans actually like surprises, but they will never admit it until after it has happened, and then they always request to see the same thing again which of course they're not actually gonna like because it wouldn't be a surprise

12.26.17  3:32 pm   In hotewig you talked about jesus, mohammed, and siddartha as if they were real, flesh and blood people that physically existed and were a part of history.

     so you took that part literally, but not the part where i said a plane was a boat

      Do we know for sure if they existed though? Like, regardless if you believe in the religions or stories associated with them or not, would historians say that jesus, mohammed, and siddartha  (and other religious figures like abraham, moses, the disciples, etc) actually physically existed? 

     it is almost impossible to determine, but regardless, they became indelible branding icons for those religions in the centuries that followed

12.26.17  3:26 pm   wanna suck elon musk's dick?

     not right now, thank you for the opportunity

12.26.17  3:18 pm   Is it possible to curry something other than favor?

     i didn't even know it was possible to do that

12.26.17  3:09 pm   is christmas?

     sure

12.26.17  3:09 pm   i miis yuo

     i didn't leave

12.26.17  3:05 pm   how about the phrase "done and dusted"? do you enjoy it?

     i've never heard it, but it sounds pretty good. good sound, and also easy to understand

12.26.17  2:44 pm   Why is october called OCTober if it is the 10th month? Same as SEPTember (not the 7th month) and DECember (not the 10th month)?? Is this a prank? 

     i think they used to be

12.26.17  1:24 pm   but live action /is/ much cooler than animation. the lesson here is listen to your heart, not your fans

     that is true, that is what i have always done. thanks so much for your help. i mean it this time

12.26.17  11:55 am   Is your family supportive of the videos you create on YouTube?

     i actually don't create them on youtube, i make them offline, and then upload them to my website (and youtube also) when they are done

     water

     sore subject

     that's true

     egypt?

     yes

     to protect you from seeing the word "christ" which might be offensive because jesus christ was recently fired for sexual harrassment

     i did not

     christmas is usually on december 25

12.26.17  4:05 am   What to do when its boxing day?
(also Merry Christler For Yesterday)

     take my gifts, put them back in the box, and sell them online

12.26.17  3:39 am   Why did you choose eat trees and hi i'm steve to make a t-shirt of? 

     i used a random number selector to pick which videos to make designs from

12.26.17  2:39 am   Do you know how to deal with idiots?

     the fun part about dealing with 'idiots' is you get to make up a new way every time. and i get lots of practice because everyone is an idiot, including you and me

12.26.17  2:14 am   Do i really need to stay countless hours memorizing all the notes if i wanna learn how to play the piano?

     i wouldn't think of it like 'memorizing the notes' i would say it's more like getting to know someone and becoming friends with them

12.26.17  2:02 am   i get that history videos take a long time but you know what else takes a long time
(live action music videos)
like if HoJ or a similar length/style of video takes 14 weeks (and possibly less time using new tricks you have surely learned), then it seems cooler & better to release medium-length teachy style videos than 3 minute songs if they are each gonna take 10-15 weeks. just seems like live action has proven to be about a zillion times harder and less efficient to do and not much cooler than pure animation.

     thanks for your help

12.26.17  1:26 am   i think people are what they notice. do you seen what i mean?

     oh hell yeah

12.26.17  1:06 am   What is your favorite thing you got this Christmas?

     a strike against my youtube channel, for a 1 second video that came out 3 years ago

12.26.17  12:48 am   is this thing on?

     yes

12.25.17  10:42 pm   Why are the words "Questions" and "Thank" misspelled on the site?

     'questions' i do not consider a misspelling, because there is a color scheme that needs to be taken into account there. 'thabk' is an issue i have answered here at least 100 times before but maybe i will answer it again soon if i am feeling frisky

12.25.17  10:42 pm   What is your life's work?

     can't say, don't wanna jinx it
